name: Basket Ogress
description: -Basket Ogress told by Mrs. Martha Lamont of Tulalip, Washington. -Beginning of this story is not on this tape (Vi Hilbert);1st 23 lines of the transcript are missing on the tape. -Tape copy prepared by the University of Washington Ethnomusicology Archives 5/95. -From 2007-101-T-82
